Package com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.tasks

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGeneralAuthoringTaskContext
    Marker interface for representing a terminology independent general authoring task context.
    ITaskContext
    Cloneable and serializable representation of a task context.
    ITaskContextBranchManagementPolicy
    Task context based branch management policy representation.
    ITaskIdentifier
    Represents and uniquely identifies a Mylyn task with its unique identifier and the repository URL.
    ITaskNotificationMessage  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TaskChangeNotificationMessage  
    TaskChangeTrigger
    This class holds constants for remote task notifications.
    TaskClosedNotificationMessage  
    TaskContext
    Abstract task context implementation.
    TaskContextBranchManagementPolicy
    ITaskContextBranchManagementPolicy implementation.
    TaskDetails
    Carries the task identifier as well as the identifier of the user who initiated the action.
    TaskHibernatedNotificationMessage
    A NotificationMessage sent when a task has been left idle for too long and its associate index folders are removed to save space.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TaskContextManager
    Singleton for creating and managing task context instances.
    TaskScenario  
    TaskScenario.AuthorArity  
    TaskScenario.AuthoringType  
    TaskScenario.ReviewerArity  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NothingToPromoteException
    Custom InterruptedException to indicate nothing to promote.
    PromoteException
    Exception indicating that an exception occurred during the promotion process.
